summary:
• Settlement reached with NZTA and NX2 on Puhoi to Warkworth (P2W) project disputes (COVID-19 and weather delays).
  • FY25 financial impact:
  • Loss on claims receivable of ~$16.4m (EBIT before Significant Items).
  • ~$56m cash proceeds to be received in FY25.
  • Outstanding insurance claims for weather/landslip damages still under negotiation.
  • Final project outcome pending resolution of minor matters and insurance claims.

Prioritized: Settlement terms, financial impact (loss/proceeds), and unresolved risks.
